name: pern-chat
description: Chat with PERN Stack and Socket.io
author: Juravlev D

scripts.setup: yarn && yarn --cwd client install && yarn --cwd server install
scripts.build: yarn --cwd server run build && yarn --cwd client run build
scripts.server:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development yarn --cwd server run dev
scripts.server:start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn --cwd server run start
scripts.client:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development yarn --cwd client run dev
scripts.client:start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn --cwd client run start
scripts.heroku-prebuild: yarn --cwd client install && yarn --cwd server install
